name: Bullet Bastion
description:
Bullet Bastion is a fast paced alien murderfest that combines the gameplay of  tower defense with the visual esthetics of a bullet hell game. In Bullet Bastion you are in command of the Bastion on the night that the evil Krabulons invade.  Build up your defenses and pump the aliens full off lead, shrapnel, lasers and more.

Bullet Bastion was developed for the 2022 Bullet Hell Game Jam. For which participants had to create a bullet hell game in 10 days with the theme "confined". This quickly gave me the idea that the player would generate the bullet hell from one stationairy point, the Bastion.

This is my first ever Game Jam game and was made in Game Maker. I hope you enjoy it. If you have any issues with the game, drop a comment and I'll try to fix it.

Mark.
